mapper.select: SELECT pxt.id AS id, pxt.productid AS productId, pxt.itemid AS itemId, dfi.name AS name, dfi.description AS description, pxt.value AS value, dfg.id AS groupId, dfg.type AS groupType FROM product_ext_info AS pxt JOIN df_item AS dfi ON dfi.id = pxt.itemid JOIN df_group_item AS dfgi ON dfgi.itemid = dfi.id JOIN df_group AS dfg ON dfg.id = dfgi.groupid where productid = #{productId} order by pxt.id;
